mapper.name: BaseMapper
mapper.select: SELECT table_name, column_name, data_type, data_length FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS WHERE table_name = 'TEST'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST (TRSCDTM, CUSTNO, CHNID, SESID, CHNEVTID, REFKEY, EVTID) VALUES (SYSTIMESTAMP, #{CUSTNO}, #{CHNID}, #{SESID}, #{CHNEVTID}, #{REFKEY}, #{EVTID} )
